mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jl_qrcode_create ( appid, scene, create_time, update_time, dest_path, pic_path, file_name ) VALUES ( #{appid}, #{scene}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{destPath}, #{picPath}, #{fileName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE jl_qrcode_create SET appid = #{appid}, scene = #{scene}, update_time = #{updateTime}, dest_path = #{destPath}, pic_path = #{picPath}, file_name = #{fileName} WHERE id = #{id}
